name: examples
description: In this directory, you can find examples how to use IBM watsonx.ai Node.js SDK in different scenarios.

scripts.text_generation: node example_list_models_and_generate_text.js && node example_prompt_generate_text.js && node example_prompt_generate_stream_text.js && node example_tokenize_input.js
scripts.chat: node example_chat.js && node example_chat_stream.js && node example_chat_image.js && node example_chat_tools.js
scripts.all: npm run text_generation && npm run embeddings && npm run chat
scripts.all-ext: npm run all && npm run prompt_tuning
